name: BasixProtocol
description: BasixToken Monetary Supply Policy. This is an implementation of the BasixToken Ideal Money protocol. BasixToken operates symmetrically on expansion and contraction. It will both split and combine coins to maintain a stable unit price. * This component regulates the token supply of the BasixToken ERC20 token in response to market oracles.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: rebase
functionDecorators.description: Initiates a new rebase operation, provided the minimum time period has elapsed. The supply adjustment equals (_totalSupply * DeviationFromTargetRate) / rebaseLag Where DeviationFromTargetRate is (MarketOracleRate - targetRate) / targetRate and targetRate is CpiOracleRate / baseCpi.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. * NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

functionDecorators.name: setDeviationThreshold
functionDecorators.description: Sets the deviation threshold fraction. If the exchange rate given by the market oracle is within this fractional distance from the targetRate, then no supply modifications are made. DECIMALS fixed point number.

parameterDecorators.name: deviationThreshold_
parameterDecorators.description: The new exchange rate threshold fraction.

functionDecorators.name: setMarketOracle
functionDecorators.description: Sets the reference to the market oracle.

parameterDecorators.name: marketOracle_
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the market oracle contract.

functionDecorators.name: setOrchestrator
functionDecorators.description: Sets the reference to the orchestrator.

parameterDecorators.name: orchestrator_
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the orchestrator contract.

functionDecorators.name: setRebaseLag
functionDecorators.description: Sets the rebase lag parameter. It is used to dampen the applied supply adjustment by 1 / rebaseLag If the rebase lag R, equals 1, the smallest value for R, then the full supply correction is applied on each rebase cycle. If it is greater than 1, then a correction of 1/R of is applied on each rebase.

functionDecorators.name: setRebaseTimingParameters
functionDecorators.description: Sets the parameters which control the timing and frequency of rebase operations. a) the minimum time period that must elapse between rebase cycles. b) the rebase window offset parameter. c) the rebase window length parameter.

parameterDecorators.name: minRebaseTimeIntervalSec_
parameterDecorators.description: More than this much time must pass between rebase operations, in seconds.

parameterDecorators.name: rebaseWindowOffsetSec_
parameterDecorators.description: The number of seconds from the beginning of the rebase interval, where the rebase window begins.

parameterDecorators.name: rebaseWindowLengthSec_
parameterDecorators.description: The length of the rebase window in seconds.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
